mapper.select: select * from (select rownum R, Q.* from (select * from QNA order by ref desc, step asc) Q) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
mapper.update: update QNA set hit=hit+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.insert: insert into QNA values(qna_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, sysdate, 0, #{contents}, qna_seq.currval, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update QNA set step=step+1 where ref=#{ref} and step>#{step}
